sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import SubNav from '../components/SubNav'; const Finance = () => { const [activeSubTab, setActiveSubTab] = useState('dashboard'); const subTabs = [ { id: 'dashboard', name: 'Dashboard' }, { id: 'pnl', name: 'P&L' }, { id: 'balancesheet', name: 'Balance Sheet' }, { id: 'cashflow', name: 'Cash Flow' }, { id: 'budget', name: 'Budget' }, { id: 'forecast', name: 'Forecast' }, ]; const renderSubContent = () => { switch (activeSubTab) { case 'dashboard': return (
{/* Financial Overview Cards */}

Total Revenue

$2.4M

+12% from last month

Cash Flow

$450K

+8% from last month

Expenses

$1.2M

-3% from last month

Profit Margin

24%

+2% from last month

{/* Recent Transactions */}

Recent Transactions

{[ { id: 1, description: 'Customer Payment - TechCorp Inc.', amount: '+$125,000', date: '2024-01-15', type: 'income' }, { id: 2, description: 'Office Rent Payment', amount: '-$8,500', date: '2024-01-14', type: 'expense' }, { id: 3, description: 'Software Subscription', amount: '-$2,300', date: '2024-01-13', type: 'expense' }, { id: 4, description: 'Consulting Revenue', amount: '+$45,000', date: '2024-01-12', type: 'income' }, ].map((transaction) => (

{transaction.description}

{transaction.date}

{transaction.amount}
))}
); case 'pnl': return (

Profit & Loss Statement

Revenue $2,400,000
Cost of Goods Sold -$1,200,000
Gross Profit $1,200,000
Operating Expenses -$800,000
Operating Income $400,000
Net Income $400,000
); case 'balancesheet': return (

Balance Sheet

Assets

Cash & Cash Equivalents $850,000
Accounts Receivable $320,000
Inventory $180,000
Total Assets $1,350,000

Liabilities & Equity

Accounts Payable $120,000
Short-term Debt $200,000
Retained Earnings $1,030,000
Total Liabilities & Equity $1,350,000
); case 'cashflow': return (

Cash Flow Statement

Operating Activities

Net Income $400,000
Depreciation $50,000
Changes in Working Capital -$30,000
Net Cash from Operations $420,000

Investing Activities

Capital Expenditures -$150,000
Net Cash from Investing -$150,000

Financing Activities

Debt Repayment -$50,000
Net Cash from Financing -$50,000
Net Change in Cash $220,000
); default: return
Select a sub-section
; } }; return (

Finance

Track your financial performance and transactions

{renderSubContent()}
); }; export default Finance;
